price: 3. à l’exception de ceux qui ont cru, ont accompli les bonnes œuvres, se sont recommandé la vérité, et se sont recommandé la patience.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti watawāṣaw bil-ḥaqi watawāṣaw bil-ṣabri
